page.title: 17THE INKWORKS - LINTZFORD
page.content: The ink is produced for newspapers and packaging and also sold to all types of printers throughout the United Kingdom as well as to various countries in the world. All colours of ink are manufactured. The ink is made from a recipe of which the main ingredients are oils, varnishes, various pigments and solvents. These are mixed together then this mixture is ground through a three roll machine mill. The works have three of these roll mills, some mixers and various other machines. Approximately twenty to thirty tons of ink are sold each week. The Company owns about three acres of land, two vans, two Heavy Goods vehicles and quite a few Company cars.
